name: Alarm Clock
description: A simple alarm clock made by javascript. There has a ringing sound effect when it reaches the time.

name: Budget Apps
description: Project for creating specific budgets and expenses. Here has a nice interface of listing and tracking all the budgets.

name: Geometry Calculation
description: Several basic area of geometry can be calculate with this project.

name: Simple Forecast
description: This is a basic of weather forecast application. Basic of weather condition feature available here.
